noProject.title: No Project Selected
noProject.description: Select a project from the sidebar to generate changelogs.

steps.step1: Step 1: Select completed tasks to include

source.label: Changelog Source
source.gitHistoryDescription: Generate from recent commits or tag range
source.branchDiffDescription: Generate from commits between two branches

gitOptions.title: Git History Options
gitOptions.allCommitsSince: All commits since this version will be included

list.noCompletedTasksHint: Complete tasks in the Kanban board and mark them as "Done" to include them in your changelog.
list.noCommitsHintHistory: Configure the history options and click "Load Commits" to preview.
list.noCommitsHintBranch: Select both branches and click "Load Commits" to see the changes.

config.customInstructionsPlaceholder: Add any special instructions for the AI...
config.customInstructionsHint: Optional. Guide the AI on tone, specific details to include, etc.

format.keepChangelogDesc: Standard format with Added, Changed, Fixed sections
format.conversationalDesc: Natural language summaries for release notes

preview.title: Preview
preview.saveTooltip: Prepend to CHANGELOG.md in project root
preview.dropImages: Drop images here to add to changelog
preview.pasteImages: Paste images into the description to save them to the changelog
preview.emptyState: Click "Generate Changelog" to create release notes.

success.title: Changelog Saved!
success.message: Version {{version}} has been added to CHANGELOG.md

github.title: Create GitHub Release
github.description: Create a new release {{tag}} on GitHub with the changelog as release notes.

archive.title: Archive Completed Tasks
archive.description: Archive {{count}} task to clean up your Kanban board. Archived tasks can be viewed using the "Show Archived" toggle.
archive.description_plural: Archive {{count}} tasks to clean up your Kanban board. Archived tasks can be viewed using the "Show Archived" toggle.
